5-Browsing

10/26/2021

Source: vignettes/05_browsing.Rmd
05_browsing.Rmd

This vignette is currently under active development.

Now that you have created your application and formatted your data, you are ready to browse your -omic data!

From your R-prompt make sure you are in the working directory with the omicser_options.yml spawn the app:

omicser::run_app(options = list(launch.browser = TRUE))

Browse!!

Assuming you have already loaded the omicser package, once the .yml files have been generated and teh data placed in the right directories you are good to browse!

Overview

Congratulations you have successfully curated and spun up the data browser!

Now what can it do! The workflow of the tool is simple:

  1. WELCOME: exposition / meta-information
  2. INGESTOR: choose the database
  3. SELECTOR: choose what variables and data to visualize
  4. PLAYGROUND:
  • tables
  • group and -omic summary statistics
  • differential expressions 4: ETC: qc report, dataset meta-information, publications, etc. (cellxgene)

Example workflow
